scripts.build:clean: yarn run clean && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.init:
echo "#! /bin/sh

exec yarn run build" > .git/hooks/pre-push && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit
scripts.postinstall: lerna bootstrap --reject-cycles && cd app && yarn install --no-lockfile
scripts.publish:release: yarn run build:clean && lerna version --no-push && lerna publish from-git --dist-tag latest --no-git-reset
scripts.publish:beta: yarn run build:clean && lerna version --preid=beta --no-push && lerna publish from-git --preid=beta --dist-tag beta --no-git-reset
scripts.publish:canary: yarn run build:clean && lerna publish --canary --preid=alpha --dist-tag canary --no-git-reset
scripts.prettier: yarn run prettier:lerna && yarn run prettier:app
scripts.prettier:check: yarn run prettier:lerna:check && yarn run prettier:app:check
